name: Divinity: Original Sin - Enhanced Edition
description: Requires D:OS files from GOG for setup.
notes: D:OS will not receive any updates from Larian Studios and cannot be with any system configuration. Playing via Wine with DXVK solves this issue.

files.setup: N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com

content:
files:
- setup: 'N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Divinity - Original Sin/DefEd/bin/EoCApp.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native
